When a creature touches you or strikes you with a melee attack, you can activate this power as an immediate action. That creature takes a â€“1 penalty on saving throws for 1 minute. This penalty increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess. When you use this ability, you lose your resistance bonus granted by the Protection domain for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

This power replaces the Resistant Touch power of the Protection Domain.
